author: jdcasey
msg: Fix ITs for use in 2.0.10+, and also clear up the test methods that do multiple test runs (splitting them into different test methods). Finally, use 127.0.0.1 for some OS X platforms that seem to have problems resolving 'localhost' (seems like /etc/hosts is empty).

author: mikedd
msg: OPENJPA-670 committing patch provided by Jeremy Bauer
